title: Lee Peltier
summary: Lee Anthony Peltier (born 11 December 1986) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Championship club Middlesbrough. While he has played in positions in both defence and midfield, he primarily plays as a right-back or centre-back. He started his career with his hometown club Liverpool, making his professional debut as a teenager in 2006. However, after loan spells with Hull City and Yeovil Town he signed for the latter on a permanent basis in 2008.
